msg: AppArmor annotation missing. The annotation 'container.apparmor.security.beta.kubernetes.io/smtprelay' should be added.
Default service account with token mounted. automountServiceAccountToken should be set to 'false' on either the ServiceAccount or on the PodSpec or a non-default service account should be used.
runAsUser is set to UID 0 (root user) in the container SecurityContext. Either set it to a value > 0 or remove it and set runAsNonRoot to true.
